text: Zvirokwazvo, muchava munoedzwa muhupfumi hwenyu nehupenyu hwenyu, uye zvirokwazvo muchave munowana (nekunzwa) marwadzo akawanda kubva kune avo vakapihwa Magwaro (maJudha nemaKristu) imi musati mavapo, uye kubva kune avo vanosanganisa Allah nevamwe vanamwari (zviumbwa). Asi mukave munotsungirira nekutya Allah, zvirokwazvo, uku ndiko kuratidza ushingi mumabasa (akanaka)
